metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9019 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: SQL Injection vulnerability in Dolibarr before version 7.0.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the sortfield parameter to /accountancy/admin/accountmodel.php, /accountancy/admin/categories_list.php, /accountancy/admin/journals_list.php, /admin/dict.php, /admin/mails_templates.php, or /admin/website.php.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
